mapper.sql: name, code, picture, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, del, id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_consts_college ORDER BY id

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_consts_college WHERE del = 0
AND name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%' )

SELECT
FROM t_consts_college WHERE del = 0
AND name like CONCAT('%',#{param1.name},'%' )
ORDER BY id LIMIT #{param2.startIndex, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{param2.pageSize, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT
FROM t_consts_college WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND del = 0

SELECT
FROM t_consts_college WHERE code = #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND del = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_consts_college ( name, code, picture, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, del, id ) VALUES ( #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picture, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=DATE}, #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{del, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

name,
code,
picture,
create_time,
create_user,
update_time,
update_user,
del,
VALUES

mapper.update: UPDATE t_consts_college SET name = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture = #{picture, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE t_consts_college
name = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
picture = #{picture, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del = #{del, jdbcType=TINYINT},
WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType = INTEGER}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_consts_college WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
